metadata.title: Indian attack on water reservoirs blatant violation of Intâ€™l laws, norms

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 07 (APP): Indian attack on water reservoirs is a blatant violation of international laws, as the intake structure of the Noseri Dam, located on the Neelum River, was targeted at 2 a.m. last night. They said that targeting water reservoirs is not only a blatant violation of international laws but also against international norms. Security Sources termed Indian shelling on the Neelum-Jhelum Hydropower Project the worst aggression on Pakistan's water reservoirs. Indian shelling damaged the intake gates besides targeting a hydraulic protection unit of the system, they said.
